title: [Ranked] 5v5 Team Looking for Members - Perth
body:
Hi Everyone,

My team and I are looking for 4 more members to fill our roster, we are looking for experienced players who play any position and have a flare for entertainment. We are serious, but understand that the winner is the team who has the most fun!

Please Reply here, or message me in game. We are looking primarily for people with;
Coms Experience
Mid Lane
Team Fight Strategising
Top Lane
Jungle
ADC Positioning Experience
Support

We would prefer if you lived in Perth for occasional team meet ups.

replies.body: not in perth but i do have skype, ts3 and curse. Hit me up in game. Jungle main.
Are you in Western Australia by any chance?
Hi there, from perth but not currently living there. would like to try for support or mid lane.  Thank you :)
